GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by created_at and ordered by descending as dafault

GET /api/articles/:article-id.description: serves an object of article with specific id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article-id/comments.description: serves all comments for a specific article, responds with an array

POST /api/articles/:article-id/comments.description: accepts a comments object, returns the posted comment and adds comment to data

PATCH /api/articles/:article-id/.description: update an article by article id, responds with updated article

requestAccepts.newVote: how much the vote will be updated by

exampleResponse.title: 'Living in the shadow of a great man'

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by topic when given a topic
